markdownRemark.html:
Override default element content

Usage

contentRenderer={
  (innerProps, innerState, innerMethods) => <component/>
}
innerMethods
method arguments return description
removeItem(event, item, false) event: eventEmitter | null
item: object
closeModal: boolean		 undefined event used to stop propagation
dropDown('toggle') string: open|close|toggle undefined one of open, close or toggle
addItem(item) item: object true
setSearch(event) event: eventEmitter undefined expects to get event with { target: { value } }
getInputSize() - number input character count
toggleSelectAll() - undefined
clearAll() - undefined
selectAll() - undefined
isSelected(item) item: object boolean
searchResults() - array returns array of items matching /item.label/i regex, if searchBy prop is used - matches against it's value

selectRef = () => {}
isSelected = (item: object) => boolean
getSelectBounds = () => {}
